roleset.name: furnish with accessories

example.name: accessorize-v: transitive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: The project of Shandong Daewoo Automobile Parts and Components Co. , Ltd. ,that Korea 's Daewoo Corp. is participating in [*] investing in [*T*-34], hasa total investment exceeding 2 billion yuan RMB and an annual production ofautomobile parts and components that [*T*-35] could accessorize 200,000 to 300,000 cars .

roleset.note: ACCESSORIZE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from accessorize.01-v) No VN Class.
